page.title: 18RECENT EVENTS-WALES VILLAGE
page.content: {Events at Rother Valley Park 1985. {11-12th May}Rother Valley Ski Contest- about fifty people entered the dry grass skiing event.Thousands went to watch.Entrants were from all over the country. {7-8th September}Model Power Boating National Finals. {28-29th September}Kiveton Carnival Music Festival. {13th October}Salmon and Trout Fishing Tournament. { {May Day}Morris Dancing. Lord Conyer's Morris men did a May Day dance at the Forge public house. { {The Fair in Killamarsh. In early May there was a fair in Killamarsh with many rides and stalls like Bouncing Castle and a Waltzer.
